meaningMnemonic: <radical>Thread</radical> and <radical>vines</radical> alone are too weak to hold anything up. You need to <kanji>twist</kanji> them together to make them strong.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>twist</kanji> the thread and vines together, suddenly you feel a lump. You look down and see a <reading>cu</reading>cumber (きゅう) twisted into it.
